    • addMatch

      public void addMatch(int cellNumber, int xCoord, int yCoord)
      Parameters:
      cellNumber - the number of the individual cell of the grid
      xCoord - the x coordinate of the cell
      yCoord - the y coordinate of the cell this function adds the match information to each corresponding global lists
